name: Pacifism
text: Give to the Simon Williams player. Wonder Man cannot attack. Acción de Alter ego: Exhaust Simon Williams o discard 3 cards tucked under Ionic Physiology → descarta esta carta.

name: Grim Reaper
text: Quickstrike. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Grim Reaper ataca y defeats an ally, deal that ally's controller a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "If only you were my real brother...instead of this monstrosity you've become." —Grim Reaper
name: Brother vs. Brother
text: As an additional cost to attack Grim Reaper, you must discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: "Nothing will get in my way!" —Grim Reaper
name: Scythe Strike
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: If Grim Reaper is in play, he activates against you. Otherwise, take 2 indirect damage.

name: Death Cannot Die
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Grim Reaper activates against you. If Grim Reaper is not in play, find him y reveal him.
[star] Aumento: If Grim Reaper is in play, he activates against you (después this activation).
